Name: Big Mac
Description: Two all-beef patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun.

Name: Quarter Pounder with Cheese
Description: Quarter pound of 100% beef, topped with melted cheese, pickles, onions, ketchup, and mustard on a sesame seed bun.

Name: McChicken
Description: Juicy, tender chicken breast filet with a crispy coating, topped with lettuce and mayonnaise on a sesame seed bun.

Name: Filet-O-Fish
Description: Delicious fish filet, topped with tangy tartar sauce and cheese on a steamed bun.

Name: French Fries
Description: Crispy, golden-brown French fries, lightly salted and served hot.

Name: McNuggets
Description: Crispy, breaded chicken nuggets made with 100% white meat chicken and served with your choice of dipping sauce.

Name: Big Breakfast
Description: A hearty breakfast featuring scrambled eggs, sausage, a biscuit, and hash browns.

Name: Hotcakes
Description: Three golden-brown hotcakes served with butter and syrup.

Name: Sausage Biscuit
Description: A warm, buttery biscuit with savory sausage.
